alert.note: Alert for Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 21 at 2:48AM CDT until April 21 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN DEWITT...KARNES AND SOUTH CENTRAL GONZALES COUNTIES... At 248 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Westhoff to near Kenedy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cuero, Kenedy, Karnes City, Yorktown, Runge, Nordheim, Thomaston, Gillett, Coy City, Cotton Patch, Gruenau, New Davy, Choate, Meyersville, Arneckville, Ecleto, Helena and Pana Maria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
